casebody.data:
Thursday, April 12, 2001

MOTION DOCKET

85-1209. State v. Scott.

Cuyahoga App. No. 48609. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution of sentence set for April 17, 2001,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that, in view of the pending action in case No. CR 182521, State of Ohio v. Jay Scott, in the Court of Common Pleas of Cuyahoga County, a decision on the motion for stay is hereby deferred until further order of this court.
